ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hello I'm New
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Necromancers are the best, for soloing. Even with the Fear nerf, they re also the best for surviving on PvP servers...most of the cowardly Player Killers
ygData.messageBody:
--- Beverly <beverlyreed2002@...> wrote:
> I think the title of the subject says it all. I've been playing EQ a
> little over four years now. I have recently fallen in love with my
> Necromancer. "Justene Thyme" is lvl 35 now and I've been playing her
> a lot more than my Druid that I at one loved the most.

Necromancers are the best, for soloing.

Even with the Fear nerf, they're also the best for surviving on PvP
servers...most of the cowardly Player Killers have a much harder time
sneak-attacking Necromancers successfully. They've one of the best pets, and
can kill an attacking player faster with their DoTs than even a wizard with
his mana-hogging DDs.

--
Words of the Sentient:

Don't join the book burners. Don't think you are going to conceal
faults by concealing evidence that they ever existed. -- Dwight D. Eisenhower

=====
The government that seems the most unwise,
Most goodness to the people supplies;
That which is tampers, touching everything,
Will work but ill, and disappointment bring.
-- Tao Te Ching
